DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: Consider using 'ExAllocatePoolWithTag' instead of 'ExAllocatePool'. Reason: No tag interferes with debugging..
The function being assigned or passed should be a KSTART_ROUTINE function: Add the declaration 'KSTART_ROUTINE Net_Pass_Thread_Func;' before the current first declaration of Net_Pass_Thread_Func.
The function being assigned or passed should be a KSTART_ROUTINE function: Add the declaration 'KSTART_ROUTINE Net_Deny_Thread_Func;' before the current first declaration of Net_Deny_Thread_Func.
